name: My Kitty Boo Boo
description:
Mini Jame Gam #16 Submission with the theme of Breaking the Rules and the special object of Duct Tape. 

In this game you will play as a cat stuck in the bathroom where you must "follow the rules" and be a "good cat" before your mom comes home. You can move with WASD, jump with SPACEBAR, select your abilities with 1234 (Scratch, Duct Tape, Wee, Business), use the ability with LMB, and enlarge the rules with RMB. The Duct Tape is a pick-up with limited uses that you get by walking up to it (there are three placed in the level). Oh, and do be careful of the water, cats don't like getting wet.

We hope you enjoy the game! 

-Sincerely, Your Developers: Sargis, Andrew & Oscar
